pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Credit State Migration (Transition) Matrices // Tools to help convert credit risk data at two time points into traditional credit state migration (aka, "transition") matrices. At a higher level, 'migrate' is intended to help an analyst understand how risk moved in their credit portfolio over a time interval. References to this methodology include: 1. Schuermann, T. (2008) doi:10.1002/9780470061596.risk0409. 2. Perederiy, V. (2017) arXiv:1708.00062.
